name: A Blastastic Love Story: KiriBaku
description:
Note: This game is playing around with established characters and canon of My Hero Academia, and as such, is a fangame (similar to fanart or fanfic). This is a purely fangirl/fanboy indulgent game, a doujin game if you will; if this does not sound like your cup of tea, that is okay!  There are plenty of other games out there, but please do not come here solely to bash it. This was created by fans for fans of the KiriBaku pairing! 

Play as Kirishima Eijirou from My Hero Academia, with an end goal of confessing to the one and only Bakugou! Featuring:

- 9 different achievements! (Go hunt them down!)
- 4 different endings!
- An escape room!
- Multiple choices influencing the way you experience the game!
- Beautiful art created by a talented team of artists!
- Stat balancing!
- Trivia Night!
- 30min - 1hr worth of gameplay!

Update: Vers 1.3.1 released. The grading bug should HOPEFULLY be fixed this time around.
